activities.activitycondition: not (null($ft.activity)) and not ($G.bg) and not (null($ft.actions)) and (lng(denull($ft.actions))>0 or $ft.actions~={""})
null($ft.activity) and not ($G.bg) and not (null($ft.actions)) and (lng(denull($ft.actions))>0 or $ft.actions~={""})
not (same(status in $L.file, status in $L.file.save)) and (status in $L.file)~#"Closed"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Status Changed from " + status in $L.file.save + " to " + status in $L.file }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(current.phase in $L.file, current.phase in $L.file.save)) and (current.phase in $L.file)~#"done"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Phase Changed from " + current.phase in $L.file.save + " to " + current.phase in $L.file }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(assignment.dev in $L.file, assignment.dev in $L.file.save)) and type in $L.file="feature"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Development Team changed from " + nullsub(assignment.dev in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(assignment.dev in $L.file,"none") }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(assignment.test in $L.file, assignment.test in $L.file.save)) and type in $L.file="feature"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Test Team changed from " + nullsub(assignment.test in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(assignment.test in $L.file,"none") }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(owner.dev in $L.file, owner.dev in $L.file.save)) and type in $L.file="feature"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Development Owner changed from " + nullsub(owner.dev in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(owner.dev in $L.file,"none") }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(owner.test in $L.file, owner.test in $L.file.save)) and type in $L.file="feature"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Test Owner changed from " + nullsub(owner.test in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(owner.test in $L.file,"none") }
{"The Release Number changed from " + nullsub(release in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(release in $L.file,"none") }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(owner.release in $L.file, owner.release in $L.file.save)) and type in $L.file="release"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Release Owner changed from " + nullsub(owner.release in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(owner.release in $L.file,"none") }

activities.activitycondition: not (same(release.date in $L.file, release.date in $L.file.save)) and type in $L.file="release"
activities.activitydescription: {"The Release Date changed from " + nullsub(release.date in $L.file.save, "none") + " to " + nullsub(release.date in $L.file,"none") }
